channel.title: Linear Solvers - Domain Flow Architecture
channel.description: Solving systems of equations is the impetus for the class of algorithms called linear solvers.

item.title: Linear Solvers
item.description: Linear solvers are algorithms designed to solve a linear system of equations.

item.title: Gaussian Elimination
item.description: Gaussian Elimination, also known as $LU$ decomposition, decomposes a linear transformation defined by the matrix $A$ into a lower-triangular matrix $L$, and an upper-triangular matrix $U$ such that $$A = L \otimes U$$.
